Speech to Text: Tell me what's wrong with my face, bro.
Doctor's Response: With what I see, I think you have severe acne on your face, which appears to be a combination of comedonal and inflammatory acne, and one of the lesions on your lower lip looks like a possible cold sore. I would suggest using a benzoyl peroxide and salicylic acid based cleanser and topical cream to help control the acne, and an antiviral medication for the cold sore, and if the acne persists, a dermatologist visit is recommended.
